EmailTemplate.name: DataArchiva : Archive Success
EmailTemplate.subject: Data Archive Success
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear **name**,
This is a system generated mail from Salesforce DataArchiva application. DataArchiva successfully archived records based on archive filter policy. Please find details below.
Organization ID : **OrgId**
**Message**
Note :- You can unsubscribe email notifications by going to App Settings under DataArchiva Dashboard.
Thanks, DataArchiva System
